response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the stove. The next step is to cook the prawn. However, the prawn is not in the robot's inventory, so it cannot be cooked. The robot needs to first pick up the prawn.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(4) Take out the butter from the fridge
(5) Move to the stove
(6) Cook the prawn
(7) Move to the plate
(8) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(9) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the prawn from the fridge
    shrimp = registry(env,"shrimp_201")
    EasyGrasp(robot, shrimp)
    donothing(env)
